title: Chapter 1817 - Three Goals
body:
Chapter 1817 - Three Goals

Originally, according to Jing Cheng’s plans, when “Li Xuanjun” inevitably met with disaster, he’d shatter the talisman they’d given him. But now, an unexpected variable had appeared in their plans—Su Yi had indeed met with danger, only to send three divine children fleeing in terror!

“All that planning, but I would never have guessed that guy would be Su Yi!” Jing Cheng said sourly.

“High Elder, should we change our approach?” Jing Hongyu realized this would be difficult too.

Su Yi’s real identity didn't mean that much to them, but his terrifying strength filled their hearts with terror. How could someone so powerful possibly lower his head in submission to the Giant Whales?

“No need for that,” Jing Cheng said decisively. “As of yet, Su Yi has no idea of our plans to control him. All we need to do is express our sincerity, and we might well be able to work with him.”

Jing Hongyu was stunned. “Work with him?

“That’s right,” said Jing Cheng. His eyes flashed. “He can decipher the secret glyphs of the Dragon Palace, while we control many of the Dragon Palace’s secrets. Do you really think he’ll refuse to work with us?”

Jing Cheng paused, then said,...
